A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful visuals are not enough to redeem Rian Johnson's self indulgent take on the Star Wars universe.  Plot holes\, pointless subplots\, and a profane treatment of the source material make this a pointless waste of time and money.   I understand Disney's desire to \"let the past go\"\, but there was no need to drag it through the dirt on it's way out.  If you expect your movie to make a billion dollars\, you should be able to afford a decent writer/director.
